title: Exopods
description:
Exopods help you deploy the backend, frontend, or open-source apps under one umbrella.

Features:
1. Effortless Deployment: Deploy directly from GitHub with no technical setup required.
2. Pay-as-you-go Flexibility: Scale resources up or down to match your needs and budget.
3. Secure Your Domain: Benefit from free SSL-secured domain hosting or connect your existing domain easily.
4. Unlimited requests
5. Go live in seconds
